item.title: Hugo Cheatsheet
item.description: Publish to github Generate htmls docker exec -it hugo hugo Find and replace wrong address like “:1313” $ cd public/ $ grep -ri :1313 * $ sudo find ./ -type f -exec sed -i -e 's/:1313//g' {} \; $ sudo find ./ -type f -exec sed -i -e 's/192\.168\.0\.199/laowalter.github.io/g' {} \; Hugo markdown format Section number default Section number is set to “true” add “section_number = false” to front matter

item.title: jekyll
item.description: Jekyll Install $ sudo emerge -av dev-ruby/rubygems $ gem install bundler jekyll $ echo "export PATH=$PATH:~/.gem/ruby/2.3.0/bin" > ~/.bashrc " $source ~/.bashrc $jekyll new blog $cd blog $bundle install ~/blog/ $bundle exec jekyll serve
